biotools.summary: CirComPara2 is a computational pipeline to detect, quantify, and correlate expression of linear and circular RNAs from RNA-seq data that combines multiple circRNA-detection methods.

bioschemas.name: CirComPara2
bioschemas.summary: CirComPara2 is a computational pipeline to detect, quantify, and correlate expression of linear and circular RNAs from RNA-seq data that combines multiple circRNA-detection methods.
